pkgmetadata.longdescription: Glm Fitting and Variable Selection using 'RcppArmadillo' // Fits glms using 'RcppArmadillo', can use Fisher's scoring, BFGS, or L-BFGS. Can also make use of parallel computation to speed up fitting process via 'OpenMP'. Also can perform best subset selection with an efficient branch and bound algorithm that allows best subset selection for more variables.
